characterInfo.Family: Lopen (cousin), Chilinko (uncle?), Punio (cousin?), Lopen's Mother (aunt?), Huio (cousin?)

characterDescription:
Rod was one of Lopen's cousins. He barely spoke Alethi.
Late in 1173, Lopen brought Rod and yet another of his cousins, Huio, to join Bridge Four.
Kaladin hadn't really known him, and he was ultimately killed by the Parshendi.
